member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaModuleBase.PostToJournal
member.summary: PostToJournal - If true, the module can post a message to the journal

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaModuleBase.PostToJournalSiteWide

member.summary: OverrideJournalSetting - if true, the module will override the site setting (if it exists)

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaModuleBase.NotifyOnUpdate
member.summary: NotifyOnUpdate - if true, the module will notify people in the message center when an update is performed

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The SqlDataProvider Class is an SQL Server implementation of the DataProvider Abstract class that provides the DataLayer for the HTML Module.
[cnurse] 9/21/2004 Moved HTML to a separate Project
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.RegExUtility.IsNumber(System.Object)
member.summary: IsNumber - this method uses a regular expression to determine if the value object is in a valid numeric format.
member.param: Object - the object to parse to see if it's a number
member.returns: If true, the Value object was in a valid numeric format
member.remarks: This method does not consider commas (,) to be a valid character. This overload defaults PositiveOnly to True.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.RegExUtility.IsNumber(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: IsNumber - this method uses a regular expression to determine if the value object is in a valid numeric format.
member.param: Object - the object to parse to see if it's a number
Boolean - if true, a negative number will be considered valid
member.returns: If true, the Value object was in a valid numeric format
member.remarks: This method does not consider commas (,) to be a valid character.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.RegExUtility.IsBoolean(System.Object)
member.summary: IsBoolean - this method uses a regular expression to determine if the value object is in a valid boolean format.
member.param: Object - the object to parse to see if it is in a boolean fomat
member.returns: If true, the Value object was in a valid boolean format
member.remarks: This method looks for one of the following: 1, 0, true, false (case insensitive)

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.AddMedia(DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaInfo)
member.summary: AddMedia adds a MediaInfo object to the Database

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetMedia(System.Int32)
member.summary: GetMedia gets the MediaInfo object from the Database

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.UpdateMedia(DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaInfo)
member.summary: UpdateMedia saves the MediaInfo object to the Database

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.UpgradeMedia(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: UpgradeMedia updates the image control references to Media in the Database
member.param: The Id of the old module
The Id of the new module

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.DeleteMedia(System.Int32)
member.summary: DeleteMedia deletes the media associated with the specified module instance
member.param: Integer - the id of the specific module instance

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.EncodeUrl(System.String)
member.summary: EncodeUrl - this method switches any ampersands with the encoded versions of the ampersands for XHTML compliance
member.remarks: This method does not check to see if the encoding has already been done.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.DisplayMedia(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,DotNetNuke.Entities.Modules.ModuleInfo,DotNetNuke.Entities.Portals.PortalSettings)
member.summary: Retrieves the markup to display to the end-user

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetObjectKeyForJournal(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetObjectKeyForJournal - a centralized way to always get a properly formatted key for journal items
member.returns: Valid objectKey for use with the journal

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetObjectKeyForJournal(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: GetObjectKeyForJournal - a centralized way to always get a properly formatted key for journal items
member.param: The type of content being saved to the journal
member.returns: Valid objectKey for use with the journal

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetMediaJournalTypeID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a journal type associated with voting (using one of the core built in journal types).

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetImageFromProvider(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: GetFileFromProvider - returns a API-based file reference to files, regardless of FolderProvider

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetFileFromProvider(System.Int32,DotNetNuke.Services.FileSystem.IFolderInfo,System.String)
member.summary: GetFileFromProvider - returns a API-based file reference to files, regardless of FolderProvider
member.param: the reference object for the folder

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.GetFileUrl(DotNetNuke.Services.FileSystem.IFileInfo)
member.summary: GetImageFileUrl - this method returns the valid URL for any file, regardless to folder or folder provider in use
member.remarks: WARNING!!! This method can return exceptions. They should be caught and processed in the UI though.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.ExportModule(System.Int32)
member.summary: ExportModule implements the IPortable ExportModule Interface
member.param: The Id of the module to be exported

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.ImportModule(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface
member.param: The Id of the module to be imported

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.MEDIA_FILE_TYPES
member.summary: MEDIA_FILE_TYPES - in conjunction with the DNN global images, these are the file types that this module will work with.
member.remarks: This property had to be created to replace the constant, because DNN 5.x handles the file extensions differently than 4.x.
member.history: [wstrohl] - 20100523 - Created from a constant. [wstrohl] - 20101124 - Changed the application version reference from the glbAppVersion; Added support for MP4 [wstrohl] - 20101127 - Moved from the EditMedia view

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.Media.MediaController.SUPPORTED_MEDIA_FILE_TYPES
member.summary: SUPPORTED_MEDIA_FILE_TYPES - These are the file types that this module will allow, per the Host Settings.
member.remarks: This property is a reflection of the Host Settings configuration.
